text: Dichostates lignarius is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Félix Édouard Guérin-Méneville in 1850. It is known from Botswana, Namibia, Ethiopia, Mozambique, Somalia, Kenya, Zimbabwe, and South Africa.BioLib.cz - Dichostates lignarius. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Dichostates lignarius lacunosus Fahraeus, 1872 * Dichostates lignarius lignarius (Guérin-Méneville, 1850) ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1850
title: Dichostates lignarius
